I use the Walmart app to order groceries, it's user friendly but this is what the order comes like.. a huge paper bag for 2 tiny bags of nuts.. the other items are bagged similarly. I'm a single mom and I don't have a car.. this is my cheapest option for groceries but I have to choose between getting the most for my money or being excessively wasteful. I don't like having to make this choice when it's totally possible to just use less paper bags. Do better Walmart

This review is only in regards to Walmart pick up. I am waiting for my Walmart pick up and so far I have waited for 54 minutes. I am only posting this review because the last time I did Walmart pick up, I had to wait 40 minutes. Something needs to be done about the wait times for Walmart pick up. There are tons of cars here, who have been waiting just as long as I have.

Visited Walmart Supercenter in Saugus. The parking space was good enough and had enough space for vehicles and vehicular movements.

The store has an elevator and stair case. The store is accessible and disable friendly. The store is wheelchair accessible.

The store is really a supercenter with lots of lines for various items.

I enjoyed myself shopping here. The staff are not all too nice. Some are supportive and friendly, and some are there angry with work and customers.

Overall, I love the supercentre and will recommend this store to anyone to shop and widow shop.

I love shopping at Walmart. I go multiple times every month for groceries. It seems the times I usually go (at night) are not that busy. I have only asked for help from associates less than a handful of times, but they were helpful every time. I've only asked to get an item off the top shelf since there's a sign on the shelf that says to do so. Prices sometimes fluctuate, but that is expected from any store. At night, there are groups of employees stocking the freezer section so just be mindful if you're going at that time. Great Value items really do have a "great value" 99% of the time. It's not a fancy place, but they are well stocked, mostly clean, and I'm happy that there's self checkout. It's better to bring your own bags though, the paper bags don't have handles.

Good luck getting an associate to help you!!! you ask a question and they ignore you and walk away...I had to ask over 7 employees to help get me something in the automotive section before one of them was nice enough to help me... The rest either pretended to or really didn't speak any ENGLISH AT ALL AND COULDN'T EVEN UNDERSTAND WHAT I WAS SAYING!! Im sorry but in 2024 none of this should be happening. Train your employees better and learn how to treat your paying customers better!!!

Nice Inside Mall. Just a few stores closed, but everything else is open. Good food court and plenty of parking. They need to fix the down stairs in front of Macy's. Also, there's an Easy Pass office in the second floor.
This mall has a very bad upkeep. You can tell by walking around, sitting in the hot food court or seeing that in one area 3 out of 5 kids' rides throughout the hall are out of service.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience, Carlos. We'd like to look into this issue with our maintenance team at Square One Mall and get back to you. Please reach out at https://www.simon.com/contact if you would like to discuss this further.

review_text: Fun mall still has a few of my favorite stores like hot topic, Newberry Comics, Spencer's etc... not too busy or  crowded.  Chill vibes kinda sad to see it dying been going to this mall since my childhood.  Glad it's still open.
The 4th Annual Cars and Cops Car Show was amazing!! I had such an amazing time here. There were so many awesome vehicles, vendors, and people. It was incredible! I cannot wait until the next one.

Great place to go for an outing.  Wide variety of stores here.  Love going here due to what they have here. It is very safe because they have security on every floor.  Plenty of parking on every side of the building and easy access to the stores from any side.

The only thing I can say is good about this mall is the location. It is situated right on route one, quite easy to get on to and leave.

Now let's get onto everything else. Most chain stores and favorites of mine have closed and left this location. The H&M leaving was the worst thing to happen to it. Whole mall has been pretty dead for a while.

Won't have a reason to come in the near future, disappointed.

Square One Mall became so disappointing and bored to visit this place. Square One Mall employees closed many good stores. And now, they already close Newberry comic store which Newberry comic has been there many years, and I don't understand why they've closes good store over the past years. The Square One Mall utterly awful and boring to visit these awful place. I hope Square One Mall are shut down forever. I would glad if Saugus build Dave & Buster's or maybe a Movie theatre in the near future.
I like this mall. It has mainstream  and unique stores. It's a nice little walk.

This course was so cute! The owners were very sweet and the wall art is such a fun addition. You're allowed to play 'three rounds' of eighteen holes for only ten dollars which is such a deal! We will definitely be going back. (:
Amazing, we went with a big group and they gave us a discount and they are very friendly.
Amazing service and workers. My son lost his iPad and the store was closed and they came all the way back to find it for me. I will definitely be returning.
Took my kids here for day 2 of spring break! We had a great time.

Nice affordable place for the kids to spend time. 2 kids 5-11 cost me only $14 for 3 rounds of mini golf. But I feel the holes could be better built hence only 4 stars. But if your kids love mini golf then this is a great spot.
Excellent activity when the weather is too hot, too cold or too wet. By the end of the third round we had our fill and got a little better each time.
Perfect for a quick few rounds of mini golf! Great atmosphere and for $10 you get 3 rounds. We didn't have time to do all 3 but we will be back, so much fun!

Super cute & easy mini golf! I've been here a couple times now with kids, the courses are pretty small so the whole family has a shot at winning. The glow in the dark decor gives the place a super cool asthetic! Very affordable & friendly staff as well!
Plenty of parking spots

Great bjj gym for all levels. The vibes are extremely friendly and welcoming, plus Coach Rodrigo ensures everyone feels safe and comfortable on the mats, something you don't see in all gyms in the area. The coaches all clearly love what they do and strive to make the students enjoy the sport just as much. Highly recommend!
Can't say enough great things about this place . Professor Rodrigo was born to teach.  great place and great people!!

I joined wanting to try something new for exercise, as a total beginner with zero experience in any sort of martial arts and I'm glad I did.  Between instructors and classmates it's a good crew, they make it fun and it's definitely a great workout.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for believing! I'm glad you gave it a chance at first and I'm happy to see your progress!

review_text: Great place to get into jujitsu! The kids program teaches discipline as well as it does the techniques. The adults class is full of helpful, funny, and hungry individuals who understand how to be great sparring partners. Class sizes usually fluctuate from around 20 to 5 people with the larger classes happening during the week and the smaller ones typically on Saturday. Rodrigo is a fantastic instructor, he's been able to answer every question I've had so far and he's able to work with each person towards attaining their individual goals. You can tell he's invested in his studentsts growth.

Amazing environment for newcomers! I've never done any form of martial arts so im totally new to this and everyone is so welcoming and nonjudgmental! The instructor takes his time making sure I understand everything and allows me to go at my own pace! I look forward to going to all my classes highly recommend! Especially if you're a female who's interested in self defense and has never done anything like it before! Perfect environment for beginners!!
response_from_owner_text:
Jharline, thank you for the kind words! You are definitely an inspiration to others already, because you came in, not only you watched but you jumped in and tried the class which ended up in you joining the team, your team!

Keep up the great work!

review_text: Way of Life BJJ and Instructor Rodrigo has been a big part of our lives for the past 3 years. Rodrigo started training our son Jacob at 4 years old and his patience, respect, and love for the art of BJJ was evident from the very 1st class. He does an amazing job with the kids class!
response_from_owner_text:
As far as I remember, your son was my first student in the time I had just started out on my own. All I have to say is ... thank you for trusting in my ability and my way of sharing my knowledge!
Your son is a true dedicated little warrior!

review_text: Rodrigo is the best! He makes sure that everyone in class gets the techniques that are shown in class. Whether you get it on the first try or you get it after a couple of tries. Rodrigo has tremendous patience and will work with you until you get it down to a tee. Plus, the atmosphere at Way of Life BJJ is supportive and fun. Which always makes you look forward to the next class.
response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for your kind words!
Keep on training!

review_text: I have been training with master Rodrigo for years, and I can say with sincerity that he has rekindled my love of jiujitsu. He is a master of the craft, and has fostered a fun supportive environment. He has a passion for the art and it shows in all of the classes; whether there are 2 students or 20 in attendance. Anyone can get something out of his class from a 1st time white belt to a seasoned brown belt. I always look forward to attending class, and always regret the days I skip due to my own laziness.
response_from_owner_text:
I truly appreciate your words here and anywhere you do. You've been in the BJJ journey for a long time, and yes, you do miss class sometimes but the magical thing is "YOU NEVER LET GO"!

That's how I see you are deep in passion with the art of BJJ!
Keep fighting the good fight.

Thank you!

review_text: Wonderful local Karate lessons. Very clean and always willing to accommodate the kids and clients!
Longtime business conveniently located in Saugus Center. Extremely experienced & qualified and an easy 5-Star recommendation for me!

Jason is super rude to kids and parents.
He's always yelling at my son and giving him bad attitude. Adding to that he leaves the kids outside with no supervision. Jason has also yelled at me and spoke to me in an unprofessional manner in front of the kids and parents as well.  He yelled at me because I questioned his unprofessional behavior and I asked to end the the services, and to be refunded my remaining unused balance; and he flat our declined.
He ONLY cares about money.   If you take your kids to this place Don't leave your kids alone, he give me the impression that he wanted to hit the kids. He doesn't know how to talk to kids. He can traumatize any kid like he did to my son . My son loves karate classes but he couldn't be there anymore . That place is seriously a joke ! I DEFINITELY DON'T RECOMMEND IT!!

Roberta and Anna are amazing!  Riley had a blast in her basic and intermediate obedience courses and cannot wait for advanced.  These classes were a game changer for us and I would absolutely 100% recommend them to anyone.  When we first brought Riley home as a puppy... she was a lot.  Thankfully Roberta welcomed Riley on day 1 and may have been the first person to understand her.  I'm being completely objective when I say, Riley is now the sweetest and best dog in the entire world.  I don't know who came out of these classes having learned more- Riley or myself!!

I sent my Australian Shepard/Dalmatian  here since she was 1 years old. I highly recommend!! The team is so so knowledgeable and well trained, I always appreciated their insight and support with my dog. I learned so much and always felt that my girl was safe and well loved. The team was excited to see her when she came in and provided updates on how her day was. Truly, my girl would not be the well behaved dog she is without their guidance and consistent training at daycare. Daycare truly is not run like others in the area. It is safe, clean, well run! Anna makes sure the staff are trained and in control of the doggos.  The place is cool cause there is an outside with a pool! And they team is always finding fun things to make sure the dogs are loving their days spent there.

I cannot say enough good things about Roberta who we have done 1 on 1 training sessions with our dog Jack. Jack has progressed so far since we got him with Roberta's help, guidance and patience with our lil husky Jack. We have tried other places just so we could mix it up and in my opinion, we are sticking with Roberta. Our Jack is now enjoying his intermediate class as we speak and is doing fantastic. Thank you Roberta and GoodFellas Doggy Daycare.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks John!  I'm glad Jack has responded well to our training program.  We take pride in helping people achieve a strong bond with their dog through leadership.  Keep up the good work and let us know if you need anything along way.

review_text: Anna the wiener is the dog whisperer I swear. My Charlie girl as well as myself have learned so much from the three short years we have been going there. I recommend her training classes because she really engages and teaches you and your pup great skills. Her classes are small so you never feel that you aren't seen or heard. The over all care from her and her staff for these pups can not be measured. The best feeling is knowing they treat your dog as if they were their own and at home so feel better. I will always recommend this place to everyone. Thanks Anna, Roberta and the staff at GoodFellas Dog Daycare!
I have had 2 dogs over the last 16 years there. It is safe, clean, well run. Anna makes sure the staff are trained to handle dogs not babysitting. The place is kept extremely clean!
response_from_owner_text: Thank for the kind words!  My team works hard to make GoodFellas a fun, safe place for the pups and comfortable place for the humans.

review_text: Great place to bring your dog for training! I adopted a Pitt January 2021 and she was extremely energetic when people would come around, jumping all of them and she would not sit still. We went to GoodFellas for the basic training and she has been a changed dog since!! They do such a good job and they are very serious about their training! I was so happy with the results that I signed my girl up for the intermediate training!! Can't wait and looking forward to seeing my fur baby is capable of achieving!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tricia!  So glad to hear that your girl is doing well.  Training takes time and patience which you displayed in every class.  You and Lilith make a great team!  We'll see you again soon!

review_text: We've been taking our golden here for almost 2 years and we love it so much! Every time our dog comes home she's always so tired! I've never had a issue here and every staff is so helpful and friendly! The summer pool is also a big plus!! I highly recommend Goodfellas!

I have a Shiloh Shepherd who is about to be a year old. We started training with GoodFellas when he was about 3.5 months old. BEST DECISION I could have ever made. After a few training sessions I enrolled him into their daycare. Shadow loves to go to "school"- that's what we call it. He runs to the door when we go to bring him in he's just so excited to spend his day there. They taught him how to swim! I could talk about this facility all day long. They are so knowledgeable about everything. I trust this staff more than anyone with my dog. They go above and beyond to care for your pup. They do training within daycare as well. They're so trustworthy. GoodFellas will treat your babies as if they are their own. The training classes have been a godsend. It's not about just training the dogs, it's about training the owners and it's beyond helpful because you receive the tools you need to continue training at home. Someone is always willing to answer your questions and take the time to listen to your concerns. My dog LOVES the trainers. Anna (the owner) and Roberta. Without these women I truly would be at a loss with my training. They've given me the tools to be a confident dog owner. If you want your dog to have the best training/care possible, then GoodFellas is where you need to go.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing feedback!  We're so glad to hear that you and Shadow have been so pleased with our service.  Shadow's a good boy and makes our job easy!

review_text: The disorganization and mess in this store has gotten worse in the past few years. I will only go to return online orders or choose another location.

Drive up experience is awesome. Not only is it easy, but it is always quick. I've never waited longer than 5 minutes for them to come out with my order. The employees are always friendly and it is a great option for busy parents.
Whenever I go in any Target its always an enjoyable experience.  I love all the home goods and actually everything. I love shopping there.

Just went to Target.  Got a great deal on a new air fryer...$90.00 off with the sale price.
AMAZING!  Love Target ... especially when they're having a sale...one stop shopping,  you just can't beat it!

Target supposed to be better then other brick and mortar stores but NO
Customer service is poor , no training and supervisor rude maybe from over working.
What do you have I can't get cheaper or better quality somewhere else ?
You just had the vibe and cleanness now keep it for yourself I m out.

I went here for a bday gift for my daughter. I couldn't find it anywhere. A sales associate, Gregory stopped what he was doing, looked it up, went out back to see if they had it, came back in no time and then gave me the sales price. The world could use more Gregory's! If you ever see this, thanks pal, that was really great

I like target. And every time I enter the store I like it even more. Compared to the competitor. This has been my go to place. Prices are comparable to other local stores. They have more staff available in case you need help. Which is a bonus at least for me.

Only issue I had is the lack of help and knowledge in the electronics department.

one employee who I was speaking with had such a bad odor coming from them that I had to move back many feet not to smell it. I'm not knocking them. We all smell.

But I have a heightened sense of smell and I would have puked right there if I didn't move. I felt really bad that I had to do that.

But they had no knowledge of the electronics questions I was asking about anyways.  So I left that department. Other then that everything else went good.

Target Saugus is absolutely amazing! I drive from Boston just to shop there because the store is so outstanding! The employees are wonderful and extremely helpful and polite. Also the store is immaculate. Definitely 5 stars!

The best and affordable place to get a massage. I been going there at least 4 times a month to get my massage and Lily always do a great job. I highly recommend anyone that is looking for a massage to check this spot out !
Great deep tissue massage! Came here many many times for migraine, almost instant relief!!

My go-to place for a
Good deep tissue massage. I've been going here for years.
AWFUL. Worst Massage ever. they are rude, pushy, and aggressive. I left with my back hurting more then when I came in.
Best place ever to go to for massages hands down !!!
I recommend wendy and lilly. They massage great for pains.
Amazing deep tissue and stretching.
Excelente lugar
Did a scavenger hunt in Boston for my sister's bachelorette party. We had so much fun. It was so well organized and customized to my sister. She absolutely loved it and everyone had a blast!

I used CASHUNT to plan a surprise birthday scavenger hunt for my husband in Washington, DC.  The scavenger hunt was personalized and interactive and our group of 11 had so much fun!  A big shout out to Chris for all of his help getting the event organized!

Best time of my life! We participated in the cashunt bridal dash for my bachelorette and let me just say it was so much fun! The scavenger hunt was the highlight of the day offering up not only an amazing game but a great way to discover salem! We ran around the town looking for clues and also were able to enjoy the shops and scenery I would 1000% recommended!

We did the Bridal Dash Scavenger hunt in Salem Mass for a bachelorette party. Chris, the owner, was extremely kind and accommodating. The Scavenger hunt was super detailed and a great way to see the city. Highly recommend!

I had an amazing experience with Chris and Cashhunt!!! I HIGHLY recommend doing this if you are looking for a fun activity to do with a group of people!! Originally I booked the bachelorette package with Chris for my friend that was getting married and he was SO helpful. Everything was last minute and he worked so hard and efficiently to make things work and get everything to my apartment in time.

Unfortunately the weather was SO bad the day we were planning to do the scavenger hunt and it was downpouring so I asked Chris if we can reschedule (of course he said yes - he is the best)!! But as time went by we realized it would be impossible since my friend got married the week after and most of her bridesmaids were visiting out of state so they weren't around.

I asked Chris if it would be possible if we could switch the scavenger hunt from a bachelorette theme to a birthday one (for another friend) that way I can still use most of what Chris had sent for the bachelorette one and we wouldn't lose our money's worth. Chris was SO sweet about it and he changed all of the questions and changed the theme free of cost! He even sent out a new package to my apartment with a different pamphlet, different team names, etc all so it matches the Birthday Girl- free of charge!

Even the day of Chris and his team were sooo easy going and so sweet! We were running late and they pushed back the scavenger hunt an entire hour for us. The  scavenger hunt itself was an amazing time!!!!! The app ran so smoothly and you can see everything the other team is doing and the points their racking up too. I also think this is a great thing to do if you have people visiting from out of town and you want to do something fun but show them around and have them see new places at the same time. I've been living in the city for a few years now and I visited a lot of new places while doing the scavenger hunt!!!

HIGHLY RECOMMEND! also super affordable especially if you split it with the group!

I scheduled CASHUNT for 60 high school students from Oklahoma .  They loved it and it was a great way for them to see Boston.  Plus they had a bunch of fun pictures for souvenirs.   Lastly, Chris was a pleasure to work with before and during our event.   I would high recommend!!!

Had a great time and some good photos and videos taken!  I would say I wish it were longer, two hours somehow seems so short!

Would definitely use cashunt again for a future trip or party. They were very helpful at giving advice for visiting Salem. Everyone had a great time.

Chris is amazing!   A great experience was had at my twins 16th birthday years ago and the same experience if not better was had at my nieces 16th birthday today!  An experience that you can not get anywhere else!!!  So much fun, safe, socially distanced and so very well organized.  If you don't do this, you're making a big mistake!   Thanks Chris!  So very good to see you again!
Andrea
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Andrea for your kind words :)

review_text: My son enjoyed training here. Amy got him to come out of his shell a bit and gain confidence in himself. She loves what she does and it shows. She's very patient, understanding and great with the kids all the while teaching the core values of training in this field with much respect for it. Highly recommend.
My son has been enrolled in the kids class since early 2020. Amy is an amazing instructor. She is fun and patient with the children, while also teaching them to be disciplined and respectful.

My daughter has been attending tae kwon do classes at Tiger Institute for over a year.  Sabumnim Amy is patient, encouraging and maintains an inclusive environment for students in varying rank levels to practice together.  My daughter has gained confidence, strength and discipline.

Tiger Institute is fabulous. The owner Amy is wonderful. Amy is knowledgeable, patient, and a perfect teacher. Able to read a students abilities and coach individuals in the right direction. I would recommend the Tiger Institute to anyone of any skill level. Amy has the ability to teach a range of individuals holding a white to black belt in the same class. The Tiger Institute is immersed in the Saugus community and Tae Kwon Do culture and partners with other institutes for events. I can't say enough great things about the owner or recommend more the Tiger Institute.

I trained with Amy under Shirley Russell for 6 years and have continued to train under Amy for 16 years.  It has been great working with her and watching students of all ages grow.  They gain confidence and learn respect as well as learning self defense

Tiger Institute not only will train your body, but your mind and spirit as well. I attended in the 1980s and im proud to say that the school today carries on the same honorable, kind and intelligent instruction that it always haa had since the days of its founding.  As a young man, I not only learned to defend myself, and built up my self confidence but I also was given a stronger sense of morality, and insight into why kindness is a better path in life.  I made lifelong friends there.  This is THE place to go.
My son loves it there! All the kids genuinely care about each other and are very welcoming to new students. Sabumnim Amy is a great teacher and is very patient with the kids.

Tiger Institute was more than just a Tae Kwon Do facility, it was a home.  It helped me shape the person I am today and gain the confidence in myself that I needed.  I would highly recommend anyone to join!

Some great teachers and guidance counselors, but certain administrators treat people like they're above you. Even when I've behaved perfectly pleasant and professional, I have been patronized over the phone and in person. I can only imagine how those specific administrators treat the students.
This school is across from the Square One Mall. Also the 428, 429 inbound, and 430 buses goes by at Main Street.

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text: We LOVE British Swim School! The safety first approach to swimming, the small class sizes, the lesson plans, and the TEACHERS have all been amazing. Special shout out to Lily who is exceptional with the kiddos. My son looks forward every week to his swim lesson and to perfecting the specific skills required to graduate through each level. His progress has been remarkable and quick! He went from being afraid to get his face wet to dunking his head all the way in the water while he swims like a shark! Every class he practices rolling over from a face down position to floating on his back. And it is the only swimming program I have found nearby that not only teaches water acclimation and safety, but also the foundations of swimming strokes! My son is delighted by "monkey, airplane, soldier" and the speed that his legs can contribute to his inertia! Watching his confidence brings tears to my eyes as I know that these skills could literally save his life. Coach Pete does a wonderful job making students and their families feel truly welcome and the facilities are equally welcoming and accessible with no stairs and a direct entrance from the spacious parking lot. With an intuitive app and website, there are many scheduling options to choose from and multiple levels in each half hour lesson block so that as you progress through each level you can still find a class time that works for you. This is especially helpful if you have multiple family members who are swimming at different levels. Thank you, British Swim School, for being such an excellent program that exceeded our hopes and expectations!
response_from_owner_text:
Thank you, Liliane, for such a thoughtful review of our swim school! We're so proud of your son's progress in the water, and we're excited to be a part of his journey toward water safety. To see his confidence continue to grow in the water is wonderful to witness! We're so glad our commitment to helping our community learn valuable water survival skills is a value you also cherish. We look forward to continuing to share our passion for water safety with you and your son!
A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer!
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text: My 7-year-old daughter loves British Swim School in Saugus! So far, she's moved up two levels, and her skills/confidence in the water is growing! These classes made it so much easier for her to attend summer camps with pools as well. (The cancellation policy for missed classes is also great.) Overall, we're very happy with the program and would highly recommend it...
response_from_owner_text:
We appreciate your five-star approval - thank you so much!
A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer! 
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text:
As an adult who decided to face fear of water head ON. Signing up for classes was the best 1st step.
Pete and his team are the excellent. They meet you where you are at and work with your pace. They have a lot of patience, very compassionate in all they do not to mention trustworthy.
Libby Scott is the best, she has a way of making you feel safe and comfortable in the water, always reminding you that *we are still learning", "we are getting there with each step", "safety is the number one lesson" and on and on. I truly appreciate her and look forward to every class with her.
Pete and the team, all I can say is keep doing what you doing. God bless 
Rosie.
response_from_owner_text:
Rosie, we're so proud of you for taking that first step to face your fear! It's great to hear that Libby's reassuring words and approach have made a positive impact on your swim journey. Thank you for your dedication and kind heartedness - we are lucky to work with wonderful people like you! 
A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer! 
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text: Thank goodness for this approach! Our daughter for some reason had a really strong fear of putting her head under water. The BSS staff heard our concerns and set about a systematic, patient, and effective approach to not just teach our daughter to swim but perhaps even more importantly how to overcome her fears in a healthy way! I'm a licensed psychotherapist, so I was pretty impressed at how they helped her work through her anxiety. I also really appreciate their policy about allowing parents to be present, but only in encouraging and supportive ways. I heard of one Dad who was telling his kid if he didn't get in the pool, he'd push him him in! The poor kid seemed so scared, and this dad's way of literally pushing his kid through fear is not only totally counterproductive, but it stresses out all the other kids too. Thankfully, the BSS owner handles these types of situations well so the swim teachers can be free to work their magic with the kids in a safe, fun, tried, and true way! Highly recommend BSS! -Mike Boyle, LMFT, CDBT
response_from_owner_text:
Mike, thank you for this kind review and feedback about our lesson curriculum. The water can be daunting, and your daughter's hesitancy about taking the plunge is entirely understandable. Our staff is dedicated to creating a safe and fun environment for all our students where they can build confidence and try new skills without fear. It is especially encouraging to hear you've been impressed with how we helped your daughter work through her anxiety, given your extensive background in psychotherapy. We also appreciate your understanding of our policy about parents' presence and your recognition of how we handle situations that could potentially trigger our swimmers. It's been a pleasure to help your daughter overcome her apprehensions and thrive in the water. We appreciate your trust in us and look forward to seeing what else she accomplishes.
A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer! 
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text: Very pleasant experience. The swim instructors are very nice and calm. They make the children feel calm and relaxed. When they speak, they speak nicely and calmly. They encourage the student and build their confidence. Having a child with anxiety, this has been the best thing that's happened to us! She looks forward to swim class every week! Highly recommend anyone looking to teach their children survival skills in the water to join
response_from_owner_text:
Julisa, we're delighted to read your kind review and excellent recommendation! We're so glad we could accommodate your child's needs and help her build confidence in the water. It is such a pleasure to work with you and your family, and we appreciate your feedback. A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer!
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text:
If your child has learning disabilities or has anxiety problems in which you have to verbally cue your child to listen to the instructors because their ADHD and anxiety is severe, SKIP THIS PLACE. I was admonished by the "Owner" because he thinks his program is one size fits all and he knows my child better than me. My son spent 5 years somewhere else before here and thought it would be different since we could actually sit in on the lessons, which we couldn't do at the previous place we went. Well after 4 weeks before today (Week 4 was the first one I was present for, my wife did the first 3 weeks) , he was no better off than he was before he came here. He only started doing what they asked after my interventions, which were no worse than me saying "You got this buddy" ,"You can do it" or "Come on, you got to get your hair wet", promising him rewards and followed by "Good job" when he did it. I was then told by the "Owner" that he knew how to get my child to respond better than me then accused me of making my son nervous when he WASN'T LISTENING BEFORE to the instructor. After a low key argument with him, I was told that I was not welcome back which is ok, because my son didn't learn anything anyways after the 5th week. So again, as a parent, if you child only responds to your words, DO NOT COME HERE. And btw, singing nursery rhymes to a 9 year old to encourage them to swim DOESN'T WORK. For the price you pay per lesson, go somewhere else.

*To reply to the response.

I was disrupting no one. My child's class was the only one. I only spoke when it was MY CHILD'S turn. I did not say anything while anyone else was being taught. You would figure with it being his 5TH lesson with you that he wouldn't be so apprehensive to jump in the pool. My encouragements worked . Spin it how you want.
response_from_owner_text:
Joshua, we appreciate your feedback, and we regret any misunderstanding during your experience with us. Our team is dedicated to tailoring our approach to each child's needs, including those with learning disabilities or anxiety, and our instructors are well-equipped to guide our students to water safety. Our goal is to create a positive and supportive environment for all to ensure the best possible learning experience. In the previous lesson, our team spoke with you about poolside etiquette to help foster our positive learning environment. We only intervene with parental engagement when it is disruptive to swimmers, parents, and/or instructors. We're sorry that our swim school was not the right fit for your family, and we wish your son continued success in his swimming journey.
Peter, Franchise Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus

place_name: British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
review_text: Excellent swim lessons and my son is doing so well! And now he made the swim team and is doing great because of you all
response_from_owner_text:
We couldn't agree more, Tara - he's doing great, and Turtle 2 class wouldn't be the same without him! Thanks so much for your support and trust.
A safe swimmer is a happy swimmer! 
Peter, Owner of British Swim School at LA Fitness - Saugus
